description:
A mysterious mobile suit, unassociated with any nation. It can only be operated by Bellri, Aida, and Raraiya. It can change backpacks to adapt to its combat zone. Changing backpacks also changes its colors.
Space backpack - A backpack developed by Ameria which, inexplicably, can be used by the G-Self.
Atmospheric pack - A backpack used for operations within the atmosphere.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: G-Self
